Comment: I think that's a naive take.   They are doing terrible things behind the scenes.    There's no evidence that the very public dumb scandals aren't manufactured to distract us from the dark sabotage we don't see.   For instance, Musk has ransacked every government database that holds highly private information about average citizens.  Information that was very strictly segregated so it could only be accessed on a 'need to know' basis.  Why would Musk be allowed to break security protocols that protect you and me?
